description: Mitch Vaughn"The Machine"Ht: 6'0"Wt: 205lbsSeason W/L Record (2-0)Marcus Ruhl"The Titan"Ht: 5'10"Wt: 215lbsSeason W/L Record (2-2) With a combined weight of over 400lbs muscled gods Mitch "The Machine" Vaughn and Marcus "Titan" Ruhl take to the mat for an all out battle for the right to fuck. The undefeated Machine can't wait to add another win under his belt and have his oversized opponent worship every muscle on his ripped body. Titan is a resilient fighter though, despite his massive size he's fast as fuck and looking to take hold of The Machine's back. To make things interesting, both goliaths oil down their huge muscles as they try to make their way to the top. Don't miss this rough, cut-throat battle between these two sexual gladiators. Will Titan get the upper hand or will The Machine punish his opponent and keep his undefeated record?
title: OILED MUSCLE: Mitch "The Machine" Vaughn vs Marcus "Titan" Ruhl
